content: कूज् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (कूजति, कूजित) {@--1@} To make any inarticulate sound, hum, coo, warble; कूजंतं राम रामेति मधुरं मधुराक्षरं <ls>Rām.</ls>; पुंस्कोकिलो यन्मधुरं चुकूज <ls>Ku. 3. 32</ls>; <ls>Rs. 6. 22</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 12</ls>; <ls>N. 1. 127</ls>. {@--2@} To moan, groan. {@--3@} To fill with sounds. --WITH नि, परि, or वि to coo, to make an indistinct noise.
